thread.title: AIC Announces Its Innovative New Line of 12Gb/s SAS JBOD Enclosures
thread.title_full: AIC Announces Its Innovative New Line of 12Gb/s SAS JBOD Enclosures

author: Flora Huang
title: AIC Announces Its Innovative New Line of 12Gb/s SAS JBOD Enclosures
text:
AIC announces the launch of its new series of full redundancy, high availability 12Gb/s SAS JBOD enclosures for critical, performance-driven storage demand. The innovative short-depth design provides full redundancy and high availability. The full line will be available starting October and features a combination of LSI expander chip and AIC's own firmware. This ensures compatibility with most mainstream hard drives, HBAs and RAID controllers (SAS2/SAS3). AIC’s SAS JBOD enclosures allow for extreme efficiency and have easy to replace hot-swap fans. Each JBOD has its own external ports, making it upgradeable and easy to get a lot more disks in a cluster. AIC’s SAS JBOD enclosure series offers high availability, redundancy, durability and efficiency – making the $/GB a great value and investment in peace of mind.
For complete information and specifications on the SAS JBOD Enclosure Series, click here .
The series includes:
 J2012-01 A 2U 12-Bay 12Gb/s SAS JBOD, housing single/dual expander modules (field upgradeable), dual fans and redundant power supply.
 J2024-01 A 2U 24 SFF Bay 12Gb/s SAS JBOD, housing single/dual expander modules (field upgradeable), dual fans and redundant power supply.
 J3016-01 A 3U 16-Bay 12Gb/s SAS JBOD, housing single/dual expander modules (field upgradeable), dual fans and redundant power supply.
 J4024-01/J4024-02 A 4U 24-Bay 12Gb/s SAS JBOD, housing single/dual expander modules (field upgradeable), four fans and redundant power supply. The J4024-02 includes support for SAS interposer and Active Bezel.
 J4076-01 A 4U 76-Bay 12Gb/s SAS JBOD, ideal for high availability storage and high performance appliance. This 4U 12Gb/s SAS JBOD enclosure, with single or dual expanders, supports 60 x 3.5” top-loading and up to 16 x 2.5” rear-facing hot-swap drives. The J4076-01’s unique feature allows tiered storage architecture in a single unit to take advantage of the full potential of the SAS3 (12Gb/s).
About AIC
AIC is a leading provider of both OEM/ODM and COTS (commercial off-the-shelf) and server and storage solutions. With expert in-house design, manufacturing and validation capabilities, AIC's products are highly flexible and configurable to any form factor, standard or custom. AIC leads the industry since 1996 with experience in mechanical, electronic, system-level engineering as well as a dedication to innovation and customer satisfaction. Headquartered in Taiwan, AIC has offices and operations throughout the United States, Asia and Europe.
